title: Chloroform
summary: Chloroform, or trichloromethane, is an organic compound with formula CHCl3. It is a colorless, strong-smelling, dense liquid that is produced on a large scale as a precursor to PTFE. It is also a precursor to various refrigerants.[8] It is one of the four chloromethanes and a trihalomethane.  It is a powerful anesthetic, euphoriant, anxiolytic and sedative when inhaled or ingested.[9][10]
